00122                 BIGNUM *xq, BIGNUM *yq, BIGNUM *r, EC_GROUP *group, BIGNUM *factor,
00123                 BN_CTX *ctx);

00143 int libless_pairing(libless_t *env, BIGNUM *e, EC_POINT *p, EC_POINT *q,
00144                 BIGNUM *exponent, libless_params_t parameters, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00145         BIGNUM *xq = NULL;
00146         BIGNUM *yq = NULL;
00147         int code;
00148 
00149         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00150 
00151         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00152         TRY(xq = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00153         TRY(yq = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00154 
00155         TRY(EC_POINT_get_affine_coordinates_GFp(parameters.group2, q, xq, yq, ctx),
00156                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00157 
00158         TRY(tate_pairing_power(env, e, p, xq, yq, exponent, parameters.group1,
00159                                         parameters.factor, ctx), ERR(REASON_PAIRING));
00160 
00161         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00162 end:
00163         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00164         return code;
00165 }
00166 
00167 int libless_pairing_power(libless_t *env, BIGNUM *e, BIGNUM *pairing,
00168                 BIGNUM *exponent, libless_params_t parameters, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00169         BIGNUM *r = NULL;
00170         BIGNUM *two = NULL;
00171         BIGNUM *prime = NULL;
00172         BN_MONT_CTX *mctx = NULL;
00173         int code;
00174 
00175         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00176 
00177         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00178         TRY(r = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00179         TRY(two = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00180         TRY(mctx = BN_MONT_CTX_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00181 
00182         TRY(BN_set_word(two, 2), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00183 
00184         prime = parameters.prime;
00185 
00186         TRY(BN_MONT_CTX_set(mctx, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00187 
00188         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(r, pairing, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00189 
00190         /* Compute Vm(2a). */
00191         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(r, r, prime), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00192 
00193         TRY(lucas_sequence(env, e, r, exponent, prime, mctx, ctx),
00194                         ERR(REASON_LUCAS));
00195 
00196         TRY(BN_from_montgomery(e, e, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00197 
00198         /* Compute e = e/2. */
00199         TRY(BN_mod_inverse(two, two, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00200         TRY(BN_mod_mul(e, two, e, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00201 
00202         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00203 
00204 end:
00205         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00206         BN_MONT_CTX_free(mctx);
00207         return code;
00208 }
00209 
00210 int libless_pairing_multiply(libless_t *env, BIGNUM *e1, BIGNUM *e2,
00211                 BIGNUM *a, BIGNUM *b, libless_params_t parameters, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00212         QUADRATIC *qa1 = NULL;
00213         QUADRATIC *qa2 = NULL;
00214         QUADRATIC *qb = NULL;
00215         QUADRATIC *t1 = NULL;
00216         QUADRATIC *t2 = NULL;
00217         BIGNUM *t3 = NULL;
00218         BIGNUM *t4 = NULL;
00219         BIGNUM *prime = NULL;
00220         BIGNUM *r = NULL;
00221         int code;
00222 
00223         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00224 
00225         TRY(qa1 = QD_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00226         TRY(qa2 = QD_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00227         TRY(qb = QD_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00228         TRY(t1 = QD_new(), goto end);
00229         TRY(t2 = QD_new(), goto end);
00230         TRY(t3 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), goto end);
00231         TRY(t4 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), goto end);
00232         TRY(r = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00233 
00234         TRY(pairing_expand(env, qa1, qa2, a, parameters, ctx),
00235                         ERR(REASON_EXPANSION));
00236         TRY(pairing_expand(env, qb, NULL, b, parameters, ctx),
00237                         ERR(REASON_EXPANSION));
00238 
00239         prime = parameters.prime;
00240 
00241         TRY(BN_mod_mul(r, qa1->x, qb->x, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00242 
00243         TRY(BN_mod_mul(e1, qa1->y, qb->y, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00244         TRY(BN_mod_sub(e1, r, e1, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00245 
00246         if (e2 != NULL) {
00247                 TRY(BN_mod_mul(e2, qa2->y, qb->y, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00248                 TRY(BN_mod_sub(e2, r, e2, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00249         }
00250 
00251         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00252 end:
00253         QD_free(qa1);
00254         QD_free(qa2);
00255         QD_free(qb);
00256         QD_free(t1);
00257         QD_free(t2);
00258         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00259         return code;
00260 }

00264 /* Private definitions                                                        */
00265 /*============================================================================*/
00266 
00267 static int lucas_sequence(libless_t *env, BIGNUM *r, BIGNUM *a, BIGNUM *n,
00268                 BIGNUM *p, BN_MONT_CTX *mctx, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00269         BIGNUM *t0 = NULL;
00270         BIGNUM *t1 = NULL;
00271         BIGNUM *t2 = NULL;
00272         int i;
00273         int code;
00274 
00275         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00276 
00277         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00278         TRY(t0 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00279         TRY(t1 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00280         TRY(t2 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00281 
00282         TRY(BN_set_word(t0, 2), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00283         TRY(BN_copy(t1, a), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00284         TRY(BN_set_word(t2, 2), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00285         BN_to_montgomery(t0, t0, mctx, ctx);
00286         BN_to_montgomery(t2, t2, mctx, ctx);
00287 
00288         for (i = BN_num_bits(n) - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00289                 if (BN_is_bit_set(n, i)) {
00290                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t0, t1, mctx, ctx),
00291                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00292                         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t0, t0, a, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00293                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, t1, t1, mctx, ctx),
00294                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00295                         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t1, t1, t2, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00296                 } else {
00297                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, t0, t1, mctx, ctx),
00298                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00299                         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t1, t1, a, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00300                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t0, t0, mctx, ctx),
00301                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00302                         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t0, t0, t2, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00303                 }
00304         }
00305         TRY(BN_copy(r, t0), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00306 
00307         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00308 end:
00309         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00310         return code;
00311 }
00312 
00313 static int point_doubling_line(libless_t *env, EC_POINT *r, QUADRATIC *line,
00314                 EC_POINT *point, BIGNUM *xq, BIGNUM *yq, EC_GROUP *group, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00315         BIGNUM *xp = NULL;
00316         BIGNUM *yp = NULL;
00317         BIGNUM *zp = NULL;
00318         BIGNUM *xr = NULL;
00319         BIGNUM *yr = NULL;
00320         BIGNUM *zr = NULL;
00321         BIGNUM *p = NULL;
00322         BIGNUM *a = NULL;
00323         BIGNUM *t0 = NULL;
00324         BIGNUM *t1 = NULL;
00325         BIGNUM *t2 = NULL;
00326         BIGNUM *t3 = NULL;
00327         BIGNUM *t4 = NULL;
00328         BN_MONT_CTX *mctx = NULL;
00329         int code;
00330 
00331         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00332 
00333         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00334 
00335         TRY(xp = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00336         TRY(yp = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00337         TRY(zp = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00338         TRY(xr = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00339         TRY(yr = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00340         TRY(zr = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00341         TRY(p = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00342         TRY(a = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00343         TRY(t0 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00344         TRY(t1 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00345         TRY(t2 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00346         TRY(t3 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00347         TRY(t4 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00348         TRY(mctx = BN_MONT_CTX_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00349 
00350         /* Get the points' coordinates. */
00351         TRY(EC_POINT_get_Jprojective_coordinates_GFp
00352                         (group, point, xp, yp, zp, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00353 
00354         /* Test the point. */
00355         if (BN_is_zero(yp)) {
00356                 ERR(REASON_POINT_INFINITY);
00357         }
00358 
00359         /* Get the prime field order. */
00360         TRY(EC_GROUP_get_curve_GFp(group, p, a, NULL, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00361 
00362         /* Initialize Montgomery arithmetic. */
00363         TRY(BN_MONT_CTX_set(mctx, p, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00364 
00365         if (BN_is_one(zp)) {
00366                 /* Compute t1 = 3 * xp^2 + a. */
00367                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t4, zp, zp, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00368                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, xp, xp, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00369                 TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(t1, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00370                 TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t0, t0, t1, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00371                 TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t1, t0, a, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00372         } else {
00373                 /* Compute t0 = -3 (mod p). */
00374                 TRY(BN_copy(t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00375                 TRY(BN_sub_word(t0, 3), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00376 
00377                 if (BN_cmp(a, t0) == 0) {
00378                         /* Compute t4 = zp^2 and
00379                          * t1 = 3 * (xp + zp^2) * (xp - zp^2) = 3 * xp^2 - 3 * zp^4. */
00380                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t4, zp, zp, mctx, ctx),
00381                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00382                         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t0, xp, t4, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00383                         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t2, xp, t4, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00384                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, t0, t2, mctx, ctx),
00385                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00386                         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(t0, t1, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00387                         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t1, t0, t1, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00388                 } else {
00389                         /* Compute t4 = zp^2, t1 = 3 * xp^2 + a * zp^4. */
00390                         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(a, a, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00391                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, xp, xp, mctx, ctx),
00392                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00393 
00394                         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(t1, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00395 
00396                         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t0, t0, t1, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00397                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t4, zp, zp, mctx, ctx),
00398                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00399                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, t4, t4, mctx, ctx),
00400                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00401                         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, t1, a, mctx, ctx),
00402                                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00403                         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t1, t1, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00404                 }
00405         }
00406         /* Compute zr = 2 * yp * zp. */
00407         if (BN_is_one(zp)) {
00408                 TRY(BN_copy(t0, yp), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00409         } else {
00410                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, yp, zp, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00411         }
00412         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(zr, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00413 
00414         /* Compute t3 = yp^2, t2 = 4 * xp * yp^2. */
00415         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t3, yp, yp, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00416         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t2, xp, t3, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00417         TRY(BN_mod_lshift_quick(t2, t2, 2, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00418 
00419         /* Compute xr = t1^2 - 2 * t2. */
00420         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(t0, t2, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00421         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(xr, t1, t1, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00422         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(xr, xr, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00423 
00424 
00425         /* Compute t0 = 8 * yp^4. */
00426         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t3, t3, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00427         TRY(BN_mod_lshift_quick(t0, t0, 3, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00428 
00429         /* Compute yr = t1 * (t2 - xr) - t0. */
00430         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(yr, t2, xr, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00431 
00432         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(yr, t1, yr, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00433         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(yr, yr, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00434 
00435         /* Now, the slope is stored on t1/zr. */
00436 
00437         /* Compute line_x = t1 * (zp^2 * xq + xp) - 2*yp^2. */
00438         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t4, xq, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00439         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t0, t0, xp, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00440         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(line->x, t1, t0, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00441         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(t0, t3, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00442         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(line->x, line->x, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00443 
00444         /* Compute line_y = yq * zp^2 * zr. */
00445         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(line->y, yq, zr, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00446         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(line->y, line->y, t4, mctx, ctx),
00447                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00448 
00449         /* Set the resulting point coordinates. */
00450         TRY(EC_POINT_set_Jprojective_coordinates_GFp(group, r, xr, yr, zr, ctx),
00451                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00452 
00453         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00454 end:
00455         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00456         BN_MONT_CTX_free(mctx);
00457         return code;
00458 }
00459 
00460 static int point_addition_line(libless_t *env, EC_POINT *r, QUADRATIC *line,
00461                 EC_POINT *a, EC_POINT *b, BIGNUM *xq, BIGNUM *yq, EC_GROUP *group,
00462                 BN_CTX *ctx) {
00463         BIGNUM *xa = NULL;
00464         BIGNUM *ya = NULL;
00465         BIGNUM *za = NULL;
00466         BIGNUM *xb = NULL;
00467         BIGNUM *yb = NULL;
00468         BIGNUM *zb = NULL;
00469         BIGNUM *xr = NULL;
00470         BIGNUM *yr = NULL;
00471         BIGNUM *zr = NULL;
00472         BIGNUM *p = NULL;
00473         BIGNUM *t0 = NULL;
00474         BIGNUM *t1 = NULL;
00475         BIGNUM *t2 = NULL;
00476         BIGNUM *t3 = NULL;
00477         BIGNUM *t4 = NULL;
00478         BIGNUM *t5 = NULL;
00479         BIGNUM *t6 = NULL;
00480         BIGNUM *z3 = NULL;
00481         BN_MONT_CTX *mctx = NULL;
00482         int code;
00483         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00484 
00485         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00486 
00487         TRY(xa = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00488         TRY(ya = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00489         TRY(za = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00490         TRY(xb = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00491         TRY(yb = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00492         TRY(zb = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00493         TRY(xr = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00494         TRY(yr = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00495         TRY(zr = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00496         TRY(p = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00497         TRY(t0 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00498         TRY(t1 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00499         TRY(t2 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00500         TRY(t3 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00501         TRY(t4 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00502         TRY(t5 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00503         TRY(t6 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00504         TRY(z3 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00505         TRY(mctx = BN_MONT_CTX_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00506 
00507         /* Get the points' coordinates. */
00508         TRY(EC_POINT_get_Jprojective_coordinates_GFp(group, a, xa, ya, za, ctx),
00509                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00510         TRY(EC_POINT_get_Jprojective_coordinates_GFp(group, b, xb, yb, zb, ctx),
00511                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00512 
00513         /* Get the prime field order. */
00514         TRY(EC_GROUP_get_curve_GFp(group, p, NULL, NULL, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00515 
00516         /* Initialize Montgomery arithmetic. */
00517         TRY(BN_MONT_CTX_set(mctx, p, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00518 
00519         /* Convert to Montgomery form. */
00520         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(xb, xb, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00521         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(yb, yb, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00522         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(zb, zb, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00523 
00524         if (BN_is_one(zb)) {
00525                 /* Make t1 = xa, t2 = ya. */
00526                 TRY(BN_copy(t1, xa), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00527                 TRY(BN_copy(t2, ya), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00528         } else {
00529                 /* Compute t1 = xa * zb^2. */
00530                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, zb, zb, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00531                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, xa, t0, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00532                 /* Compute t2 = ya * zb^3. */
00533                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t0, zb, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00534                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t2, ya, t0, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00535         }
00536 
00537         if (BN_is_one(za)) {
00538                 /* Make t3 = xb and t4 = yb. */
00539                 TRY(BN_copy(t3, xb), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00540                 TRY(BN_copy(t4, yb), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00541         } else {
00542                 /* Compute t3 = xb * za^2. */
00543                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(z3, za, za, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00544                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t3, xb, z3, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00545                 /* Compute t4 = yb * za^3. */
00546                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(z3, z3, za, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00547                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t4, yb, z3, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00548         }
00549 
00550         /* Compute t5 = t1 - t3 and t6 = t2 - t4. */
00551         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t5, t1, t3, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00552         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t6, t2, t4, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00553 
00554         /* Test the points. */
00555         if (BN_is_zero(t5)) {
00556                 if (BN_is_zero(t6)) {
00557                         /* Point A = Point B. */
00558                         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00559                         return point_doubling_line(env, r, line, a, xq, yq, group, ctx);
00560                 } else {
00561                         /* Point at infinity. */
00562                         ERR(REASON_POINT_INFINITY);
00563                 }
00564         }
00565 
00566         /* Compute t1 (t7) = t1 + t3 and t2 (t8) = t2 + t4. */
00567         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t1, t1, t3, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00568         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t2, t2, t4, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00569 
00570         if (BN_is_one(za) && BN_is_one(zb)) {
00571                 /* Make zr = t5. */
00572                 TRY(BN_copy(zr, t5), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00573         } else {
00574                 if (BN_is_one(za)) {
00575                         /* Make t0 = zb. */
00576                         TRY(BN_copy(t0, zb), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00577                 } else {
00578                         if (BN_is_one(zb)) {
00579                                 /* Make t0 = za. */
00580                                 TRY(BN_copy(t0, za), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00581                         } else {
00582                                 /* Compute t0 = za * zb. */
00583                                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, za, zb, mctx, ctx),
00584                                                 ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00585                         }
00586                 }
00587                 /* Make zr = t0 * t5. */
00588                 TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(zr, t0, t5, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00589         }
00590 
00591         /* Compute xr = t6^2 - t5^2 * t7. */
00592         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t6, t6, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00593         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t4, t5, t5, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00594         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t3, t1, t4, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00595         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(xr, t0, t3, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00596 
00597         /* Compute t0 (t9) = t5^2 * t7 - 2 * xr. */
00598         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(t0, xr, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00599         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t0, t3, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00600 
00601         /* Compute yr = (t6 * t9 - t8 * t5^3)/2. */
00602         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t0, t6, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00603         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t5, t4, t5, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00604         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, t2, t5, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00605         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t0, t0, t1, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00606         if (BN_is_odd(t0)) {
00607                 TRY(BN_add(t0, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00608         }
00609         TRY(BN_rshift1(yr, t0), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00610 
00611         /* Now, the slope is stored on t6/zr. */
00612 
00613         /* Compute t0 = t6 * (za^3 * xq + za * xa). */
00614         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, za, xa, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00615         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, z3, xq, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00616         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t0, t1, t0, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00617         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t0, t6, t0, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00618 
00619         /* Compute line_x = t0 - ya * zr. */
00620         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, ya, zr, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00621         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(line->x, t0, t1, p), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00622 
00623         /* Compute line_y = yq * zr * za^3. */
00624         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(line->y, yq, zr, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00625         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(line->y, line->y, z3, mctx, ctx),
00626                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00627 
00628         /* Set the resulting point coordinates. */
00629         TRY(EC_POINT_set_Jprojective_coordinates_GFp(group, r, xr, yr, zr, ctx),
00630                         ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00631 
00632         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00633 end:
00634         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00635         BN_MONT_CTX_free(mctx);
00636         return code;
00637 }
00638 
00639 static int tate_pairing_power(libless_t *env, BIGNUM *e, EC_POINT *p,
00640                 BIGNUM *xq, BIGNUM *yq, BIGNUM *r, EC_GROUP *group, BIGNUM *factor,
00641                 BN_CTX *ctx) {
00642         EC_POINT *point = NULL;
00643         QUADRATIC *result = NULL;
00644         QUADRATIC *line = NULL;
00645         QUADRATIC *inv = NULL;
00646         BIGNUM *two = NULL;
00647         BIGNUM *prime = NULL;
00648         BIGNUM *power = NULL;
00649         BIGNUM *xp = NULL;
00650         BIGNUM *yp = NULL;
00651         BIGNUM *zp = NULL;
00652         BN_MONT_CTX *mctx = NULL;
00653         int i;
00654         int code;
00655 
00656         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00657 
00658         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00659 
00660         TRY(point = EC_POINT_dup(p, group), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00661         TRY(result = QD_new(), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00662         TRY(line = QD_new(), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00663         TRY(inv = QD_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00664         TRY(two = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00665         TRY(power = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00666         TRY(prime = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00667         TRY(xp = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00668         TRY(yp = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00669         TRY(zp = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00670         TRY(mctx = BN_MONT_CTX_new(), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00671 
00672         TRY(BN_set_word(two, 2), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00673         TRY(BN_set_word(result->x, 1), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00674         TRY(BN_zero(result->y), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00675 
00676         TRY(EC_GROUP_get_curve_GFp(group, prime, NULL, NULL, ctx),
00677                         ERR(REASON_CURVE_PARAMETERS));
00678 
00679         /* Initialize Montgomery arithmetic. */
00680         TRY(BN_MONT_CTX_set(mctx, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00681         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(xq, xq, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00682         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(yq, yq, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00683         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(result->x, result->x, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00684         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(result->y, result->y, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00685 
00686         /* Convert point to Montgomery form. */
00687         TRY(EC_POINT_get_Jprojective_coordinates_GFp
00688                         (group, point, xp, yp, zp, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00689         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(xp, xp, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00690         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(yp, yp, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00691         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(zp, zp, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00692         TRY(EC_POINT_set_Jprojective_coordinates_GFp
00693                         (group, point, xp, yp, zp, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00694 
00695         /* Miller algorithm. */
00696         for (i = BN_num_bits(factor) - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
00697                 TRY(QD_sqr(result, result, prime, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_QUADRATIC));
00698                 TRY(point_doubling_line(env, point, line, point, xq, yq, group, ctx),
00699                                 ERR(REASON_DOUBLING));
00700                 TRY(QD_mul(result, result, line, prime, mctx, ctx),
00701                                 ERR(REASON_QUADRATIC));
00702                 if (BN_is_bit_set(factor, i) && i > 0) {
00703                         TRY(point_addition_line(env, point, line, point, p, xq,
00704                                                         yq, group, ctx), ERR(REASON_ADDITION));
00705                         TRY(QD_mul(result, result, line, prime, mctx, ctx),
00706                                         ERR(REASON_QUADRATIC));
00707                 }
00708 
00709                 if (QD_is_zero(result)) {
00710                         ERR(REASON_QUADRATIC);
00711                 }
00712         }
00713 
00714         /* We do not need the last distance accumulation because this value
00715          * does not interfere in the pairing result at all. */
00716 
00717         /* Compute inv = result^(-1). */
00718         TRY(QD_inv(inv, result, prime, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_QUADRATIC));
00719 
00720         /* result = conj(result). */
00721         TRY(QD_conj(result, result, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_QUADRATIC));
00722 
00723         /* result = conj(result) * result^(-1). */
00724         TRY(QD_mul(result, result, inv, prime, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_QUADRATIC));
00725 
00726         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(e, result->x, prime), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00727 
00728         TRY(BN_hex2bn(&power, LAST_POWER), ERR(REASON_CURVE_PARAMETERS));
00729 
00730         TRY(lucas_sequence(env, e, e, power, prime, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_LUCAS));
00731 
00732         if (r != NULL) {
00733                 TRY(lucas_sequence(env, e, e, r, prime, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_LUCAS));
00734         }
00735 
00736         TRY(BN_from_montgomery(e, e, mctx, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00737 
00738         /* Compute e = e/2. */
00739         TRY(BN_mod_inverse(two, two, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00740         TRY(BN_mod_mul(e, two, e, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00741 
00742         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00743 end:
00744         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00745         BN_MONT_CTX_free(mctx);
00746         QD_free(result);
00747         QD_free(line);
00748         QD_free(inv);
00749         return code;
00750 }
00751 
00752 int pairing_expand(libless_t *env, QUADRATIC *e1, QUADRATIC *e2,
00753                 BIGNUM *pairing, libless_params_t parameters, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00754         BIGNUM *prime = NULL;
00755         BIGNUM *p = NULL;
00756         BIGNUM *one = NULL;
00757         int code;
00758 
00759         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00760 
00761         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00762         TRY(p = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00763         TRY(one = BN_CTX_get(ctx), ERR(REASON_MEMORY));
00764 
00765         /* Get the prime field order. */
00766         prime = parameters.prime;
00767 
00768         TRY(BN_set_word(one, 1), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00769 
00770         /* Compute (p + 1)/4. */
00771         TRY(BN_add(p, prime, one), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00772         TRY(BN_rshift(p, p, 2), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00773 
00774         /* Compute sqrt(1 - a^2) = a^((p+1)/4). */
00775         TRY(BN_mod_sqr(e1->y, pairing, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00776         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(e1->y, one, e1->y, prime), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00777         TRY(BN_mod_exp(e1->y, e1->y, p, prime, ctx), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00778         TRY(BN_copy(e1->x, pairing), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00779 
00780         if (e2 != NULL) {
00781                 /* Make e2 = (e2->x, -e1->y). */
00782                 TRY(BN_copy(e2->x, e1->x), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00783                 TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(e2->y, prime, e1->y, prime), ERR(REASON_OPENSSL));
00784         }
00785 
00786         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00787 end:
00788         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00789         return code;
00790 }
